author: CONNOR WILKERSON THE NEWS-ENTERPRISE
title: Wednesday night shooting leaves one dead, suspect in custody | Local News | thenewsenterprise.com
text: An Elizabethtown man was arrested and charged with murder after police responded to a shooting Wednesday night. Chris Allen Bell Jr., 34, of Elizabethtown, has been charged in the death of Kenyeta McWilliams, 37. An Elizabethtown man was arrested and charged with murder after police responded to a shooting Wednesday night.
